short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload the product from Alibaba to a online store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's easily to upload products from Alibaba to a shopify store. You can check the products which you like when viewing products on Alibaba and then upload the checked products to shopify store. It's very useful if you are a retailer or vendor.
